name: Backlight
title: backlight.dev
shortDescription: Backlight is a tool designed for front-end teams to create and manage design systems efficiently. It caters to developers and is also loved by designers due to its integration with tools like Figma. Users can start with provided examples or from scratch, facilitating quick setup and collaboration. An example use case is a team using Backlight to rapidly develop a design system, enabling consistent UI across products without manual updates.
pros: Visual pull-request reviews for faster validation
Integration with Figma for automatic UI generation
cons: Primarily code-centric, might intimidate non-technical users
Dependence on specific integrations like Figma
Potential learning curve for adopting new workflows
